Address.label: Address
Address.value: 16772 WEST BERNARDO DRIVE,SUITE 203, SAN DIEGO, California, 92127, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Modular Medical Inc is a development stage medical device company, which focuses on the design, development, and commercialization of an insulin pump to address shortcomings and problems represented by the relatively limited adoption of currently available pumps for insulin-requiring people with diabetes.
